chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having an issue:
hello
the DPD courier asks me to contact you because they can't deliver the iPhone 13. Can you tell me what's wrong? I really need it for tomorrow, we're celebrating our 33rd wedding anniversary and this puts me in a very bad situation.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer contacts us, because the carrier has informed that they will not be able to proceed with the delivery of the customer. 

Can you, bring us a customer friendly solution please?

We thank you for your understanding and remain at your disposal for any other question.

Regards,
Kelly from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

i have informed our logistics partner of this issue and await updates.

Regards,
RK
